name: UBasicOverlays
doc:
Implements an asset that contains a set of overlay data (which includes timing, text, and position) to be displayed for any
given source (including, but not limited to, audio, dialog, and movies)

Overlays: The overlay data held by this asset. Contains info on timing, position, and the subtitle to display
AssetImportData: The import data used to make this overlays asset
